features: COLLEGE RULED COMPOSITION NOTEBOOKS - 54 GSM 100 sheets (200 Pages) composition notebook. Excellent quality paper blue ink with red ink margin line.
DURABLE HARDCOVER - Standard weight hard cover and back marble composition notebook.
STRONG REINFORCED BINDING - These composition books have a strong durable sewn center reinforced with binding tape. Providing long lasting usage.
DIMENSIONS 9.75″ x 7.25″ - Standard weight composition notebooks college ruled. Inside covers printed with class schedule and math conversion tables.
PERFECT FOR SCHOOLS - Great for schools, journal use, writing projects, art, recipes, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent notebook at an affordable price.
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter has been using these notebooks since she started 5th grade and they are holding up very well. It is no secret that kids can be hard on things, especially when it comes to school stuff. Her backpack gets thrown around and tossed every which way as does its contents. I know this journal has taken a beating this year and it has held up surprisingly well.She likes that it is easy for her to write in when she needs to. She recently asked for another one because she has run out of room in her first book. This tells me she is happy with it.Recommended.

reviews.reviewText: Just like the ones we all grew up with. They're well made, good quality and a great value.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality School Notebooks
reviews.reviewText: These notebooks worked perfectly for our son for school. They have to keep a daily journal, and these were the perfect size. Smaller than a standard one subject notebook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Companion for Young Learners!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the ENVO Composition Notebooks for my kindergartner, and I must say, they are an absolute winner! As a parent, finding the right school supplies that cater to both quality and style is always a priority, and these composition notebooks hit the mark perfectly.The black marble covers give the notebooks a sleek and sophisticated look that my little one absolutely adores. The wide-ruled pages inside are perfect for young learners who are just starting to master their handwriting skills. The generous 100-sheet count in each notebook ensures that there's plenty of space for my child to practice their writing and drawing without feeling restricted.What I appreciate most about these notebooks is their durability. With kids being kids, there's always the potential for notebooks to be tossed around, carried in backpacks, and subjected to all sorts of wear and tear. But the ENVO Composition Notebooks have stood up to the test with flying colors. The sturdy construction and quality binding make sure that the pages stay securely in place, even with the most active of little hands.The 2-pack option is a great value, providing us with ample notebooks to last throughout the school year. These notebooks have truly become an essential part of my child's learning journey. They've become a place for creativity, writing practice, and a tangible record of my child's progress as they journey through school.In short, the ENVO Composition Notebooks are the perfect companions for young learners embarking on their educational journey. With their stylish design, sturdy build, and plenty of writing space, they've become an integral part of my child's school routine. If you're a parent looking for quality composition notebooks that will withstand the rigors of school life while offering a touch of elegance, these are definitely worth considering.
